item.title: Constructive criticism
item.description:
Constructive criticism

Behaviors that would cause problems in an interview

unsuitable wearing being nervous unprepared / prepared unenoughly

Use polite phrases to give constructive criticism.

You may want to look into ways of… I think that it would benefit you if… One thing to work on in particular is… Perhaps you could have… Bear in mind that…

Give suggestions to help our colleagues improve their interviewing skills

Who do you give constructive criticism to?

What was the most unconstructive criticism you have ever received? How could it have been more constructive?

Practice

Aiden had a very unsuccessful interview yesterday. The interviewer wrote hime an email afterword. How does he give constructive criticism?

I notice that you seemed very nervous during the interview and that you stuttered a lot during the interview. I think you may want to look into ways of overcoming your nerves. The personal assistant position can be quite stressful, but you need to be able to communicate effectively at all times.

As you are applying for a position that requires you to use the computer for long periods of time, I think that it would benefit you if you improved your IT skills. One thing to work on in particular is your knowledge of word-processing programs.

Also, perhaps you could have toned down your clothing style a little. Stick to Waring dark colors rather than bright white. Bear in mind that dark colors will make you appear more professional.
